DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study compare walk exercise program ( Exercise Group ) standard medical care ( Control Group ) prostate cancer survivor receive androgen depletion therapy ( ADT ) . The central hypothesis propose research walk exercise program positive impact bone health , health-related quality life , physical function men prostate cancer receive ADT .
